1.caption_en: An end-to-end innovation framework mapping tools and methodologies across five phases: Strategy, Concept, Launch, Growth, and Scale. The Platform Innovation Kit spans all phases while specific methods (Portfolio Management, Business Model Canvas, Design Thinking, Platform Design Toolkit, Lean Startup, Growth Hacking, NFX Bible, Business Development) are positioned along a rising curve of business impact toward Growth and Scale.
